                 * Oracle support INSERT only but does not throw exception on others

Is there a possibility to remove the Check for Oracle and MSSQL server check below? As per the comment The name of the database is being checked because there is no way to identify through the API. it seems it was done without knowing the Connection.getMetaData().supportsGetGeneratedKeys() API method.

No. "supportsGetGeneratedKeys" - function if true guarantees at least insert operation is supported. Others are vendor-specific. Oracle official driver returns true for this API but Oracle does not support key retrieval in the batch operations.
